ThingDef.label: Sleeping Spot
ThingDef.Description: Designates a spot on the ground where people should sleep. Not comfortable.

ThingDef.label: Basic Bed
ThingDef.Description: A very basic mattress with sheets on a frame for resting.

ThingDef.label: Simple Bed
ThingDef.Description: A cozy mattress with sheets on a metal frame for resting.

ThingDef.label: Fancy Bed
ThingDef.Description: A soft bedding provides a comfortable resting place for sleepy colonists.

ThingDef.label: Luxury Bed (Red)
ThingDef.Description: The luxury bed is the ultimate bed in terms of comfort. This is a bed fit for royalty. This one comes with lush red sheets.

ThingDef.label: Luxury Bed (Green)
ThingDef.Description: The luxury bed is the ultimate bed in terms of comfort. This is a bed fit for royalty. This one comes with classy green sheets.

ThingDef.label: Luxury Bed (Blue)
ThingDef.Description: The luxury bed is the ultimate bed in terms of comfort. This is a bed fit for royalty. This one comes with enticing blue sheets.

ThingDef.label: Luxury Double Bed (Red)
ThingDef.Description: The only thing better than a luxury bed is one twice the size! You don't even have to share it with anyone! All that extra sleeping room provides a bit more comfort. This one comes with fancy red sheets.

ThingDef.label: Luxury Double Bed (Green)
ThingDef.Description: The only thing better than a luxury bed is one twice the size! You don't even have to share it with anyone! All that extra sleeping room provides a bit more comfort. This one comes with snazzy green sheets.

ThingDef.label: Luxury Double Bed (Blue)
ThingDef.Description: The only thing better than a luxury bed is one twice the size! You don't even have to share it with anyone! All that extra sleeping room provides a bit more comfort. This one comes with voluptuous blue sheets.

ThingDef.label: Pod Bed
ThingDef.Description: A futuristic bed with high rest effectiveness.

ThingDef.label: Hospital Bed
ThingDef.Description: A bed specially designed for injured people. Improves the chance of successful medical work.

ThingDef.label: Advanced Hospital Bed
ThingDef.Description: An advanced bed specially designed to treat injured people. Improves the chance of successful medical work even more than the hospital bed.

ThingDef.label: Animal Sleeping Spot
ThingDef.description: Designates a spot on the ground where animals should sleep.

ThingDef.label: Animal Sleeping Box
ThingDef.description: A small box for animals to sleep in. Fits smaller animals like chickens, cats or small dogs.

ThingDef.label: Animal Bed
ThingDef.description: A soft bed for animals to sleep on. Fits any animal.

ThingDef.label: Backless Stool
ThingDef.description: A very basic platform on which to sit. It lacks a backrest.

ThingDef.label: Stool
ThingDef.description: A simple platform on which to sit. A round seat makes it a little more comfortable than the square backless stool.

ThingDef.label: Armchair
ThingDef.description: A large, soft and comfy seat. Great for relaxation. Whoever thought of adding soft padding to a chair is a genious.

ThingDef.label: Dining Chair
ThingDef.description: A sturdy and attractive chair that is typically used for sitting at a table. It is a proper seating improvement over stools.

ThingDef.label: Luxury Armchair
ThingDef.description: A luxurious throne suitable for a royal's behind. It is the best of the armchairs.

ThingDef.label: Holographical Cell
ThingDef.description: Enter to galahoo, himself ! It need a human ?

ThingDef.label: Cozy Armchair
ThingDef.description: A cozy, old-fashioned armchair covered in a textile of your choosing. Smoothed animal leather was a favorite in ancient times.

ThingDef.label: Couch
ThingDef.description: A couch is type of furniture that could be suitable for two, but is usable by only one. It won't make colonists lazy, in theory at least.

ThingDef.label: Table (Short)
ThingDef.description: Colonists will eat off of tables when a chair is facing it. This short table is suitable for 4 at once.

ThingDef.label: Table (Long)
ThingDef.description: Colonists will eat off of tables when a chair is facing it. This long table is suitable for 8 at once.

ThingDef.label: Glass Table
ThingDef.description: Colonists will eat off of tables when a chair is facing it. This tiny glass table is suitable for 1.

ThingDef.label: End Table (Lamp)
ThingDef.description: A small table with a lamp and a drawer. It would be a nice addition beside a bed. Uses 20 W to light a small area.

ThingDef.label: Journal Table
ThingDef.description: A decorative table with a journal on it. Colonists can gather here to discuss the majestic journal and the mighty steed that is the table that it rests upon.

ThingDef.label: Plant Pot
ThingDef.description: A plant pot that can hold decorative flowers to improve the mood of people nearby.

ThingDef.label: Equipment Rack
ThingDef.description: An equipment rack to store items. These items will not deteriorate, even if the equipment rack is outside.

ThingDef.label: Shelf
ThingDef.description: A decorative shelf. Must be placed near a structural wall.

ThingDef.label: Equipment Shelf
ThingDef.description: Haulers carry items and apparel here for storage.

ThingDef.label: Refrigerated Tray Rack
ThingDef.description: Haulers carry trays here for storage. This track rack requires power in order to keep food refrigerated.

ThingDef.label: Fabric Hamper
ThingDef.description: Haulers can carry textiles here for storage.

ThingDef.label: Apparel Cupboard
ThingDef.description: Haulers carry apparel here for storage.

ThingDef.label: Medicine Cabinet
ThingDef.description: Haulers carry medicine here for storage.

ThingDef.label: Pallet
ThingDef.description: Haulers carry metal and wood materials here for storage.

ThingDef.label: Skip
ThingDef.description: Haulers carry metal and wood materials here for storage.

ThingDef.label: Hazmat Container
ThingDef.description: Haulers carry shells and radioactive materials here for storage.

ThingDef.label: Item Table
ThingDef.description: A table that can hold items instead of throwing them on the floor.

ThingDef.label: Medical kit storage
ThingDef.description: A safe way to store medicine, prosthetic parts and organs. Requires a power source.

ThingDef.label: Serving Table
ThingDef.description: A small table that is used for storing all kinds of meals. Requires a power source.

ThingDef.label: Standing Lamp (White)
ThingDef.description: A standing lamp that lights an area. Requires 150 W.

ThingDef.label: Standing Lamp (Red)
ThingDef.description: A standing lamp that lights an area in a red glow. Requires 150 W.

ThingDef.label: Standing Lamp (Green)
ThingDef.description: A standing lamp that lights an area in a green glow. Requires 150 W.

ThingDef.label: Standing Lamp (Blue)
ThingDef.description: A standing lamp that lights an area in blue glow. Requires 150 W.

ThingDef.label: Floor Lamp
ThingDef.description: A simple floor lamp. Requires 80 W.

ThingDef.label: Ceiling Lamp
ThingDef.description: A ceiling lamp that lights an area. Must be placed under a roof. Requires 80 W.

ThingDef.label: Outdoor Ground Lamp
ThingDef.description: A small ground lamp that is powered by the sun. It lights a small area outdoors.

ThingDef.label: Path light
ThingDef.description: Small light with built in solar panel that lights an area.

ThingDef.label: Wall Lamp
ThingDef.description: A lamp that must be placed against a supporting wall. Requires 100 W. It has a bigger glow than most lights.

ThingDef.label: Wall Light
ThingDef.description: A small light that must be placed on a supporting wall. Requires 70 W.

ThingDef.label: LED Rope Light
ThingDef.description: This LED rope light can be placed over walls and other buildings. It requires 25 W and can be used to help move power around otherwise inaccessable areas.

ThingDef.label: Square Floor Light (White)
ThingDef.description: A square floor light integrated into the ground with a white lamp. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.

ThingDef.label: Square Floor Light (Red)
ThingDef.description: A square floor light integraded into the ground with a red lamp. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.

ThingDef.label: Square Floor Light (Green)
ThingDef.description: A square floor light integrated into the ground with a green lamp. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.

ThingDef.label: Square Floor Light (Blue)
ThingDef.description: A square floor light integrated into the ground with a blue lamp. Waterproof and quite pretty. Requires 30 W.

ThingDef.label: Feeding Bowl
ThingDef.description: Your animals will love this bowl so much that they'll go eat out of here first!

ThingDef.label: Scratching Post
ThingDef.description: Provides your cats with a place to sharpen their claws.
